website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate double-leg bicycle kickstand that delivers tremendous strength and versatility.
pros: Ideal for use with e-bikes, heavy-duty bicycles, and bicycles with rear trailers
Equipped with a center mount that delivers unmatched stability
Offers a maximum weight load of 176 pounds
cons: Heavier and more expensive than many similar kickstands
Overall design leaves much to be desired

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable and Unique
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews; nor do I fall in love with mundane items like a double kickstand!!! The quality of the materials, thoughtful, sophisticated, Apple-like design and feel combined with impeccable engineering. I liken this made-in-Italy item to my Rancilio Silvia espresso machine - perfect in every way for it's purpose . After going through 4 different stands in 3 months my Bafang 500 and 48 V. battery etc are safe. There is no other comparative item out there!
customer_reviews.author: david engels

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Solid, Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The included bolt is not a cap-bolt so installation can be tricky if you're installing it onto a bike with an existing kickstand mounting plate (welded to frame) that is in a recessed area since the only possible grip on the bolt is on the outside of the head. If you are installing this in a tight recessed area, I would recommend cutting a slot into the top of the bolt (not too deep) so you can use a flat-head screwdriver if you cant use a socket driver or wrench.. ....OR... buy a replacement bolt that does have a cap-head..
customer_reviews.author: BuyToReview

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My regular old kickstand was okay before I turned my 34-year old bicycle into an E-bike. Well, it was okay as long as it was on a level surface, preferably paved. This new kickstand holds the bike straight up without leaning, even on grass, dirt, and rocks. Even when the bike is loaded down. Someone mentioned having problems with theirs dragging when cornering. Maybe they have smaller wheels, or something. I’ve got 26” wheels and have done tight U-turns with no problem. I’m including a couple of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wade Rolston

customer_reviews.title: Way too big for a 20"-wheeled Dahon-style folding bike
customer_reviews.text: Item description did not provide enough information for me to know if this would work or not on a 20" wheeled Dahon-style folding bike. Though I'm not sure it would work on any bike this small because of interference with the chain, the death knell for it on my bike was that I have a rear derailleur, and interference with that was guaranteed. It's also quite heavy. That said, it looks to be well constructed and came with the long bolt that many said they would have needed. Guess I'll just have to stick with my single sided kickstand on this bike.
customer_reviews.author: CamperD

customer_reviews.title: Best kickstand ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Ursus double leg kickstand is, by far, the best, strongest kickstand I have ever seen or used. It has a stance that, when deployed, allows a sturdy motorized bicycle stance. My 26" frame w/built gas tank and 79cc engine and rear seat/tool box weighs in at 100lbs. I have had it fall over several times and it is a sinking experience. This kickstand will never allow a fall even on a slope. This is what anyone who has a heavy machine needs. One Love
customer_reviews.author: Gary  Smitty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works for my e-bike conversion
customer_reviews.text: I converted a Specialized Hard Rock to an e-bike, and used a conventional one-legged kickstand for a while. Eventually it cracked and broke, not surprising considering it was trying to do what it wasn't designed for. I wanted to protect my wiring, expensive lithium battery, throttle and all my commuter cargo, so for me this was a pricey but necessary purchase. Installation was easy and straightforward; I really appreciate having the built-in channel for my shift cable. It seems solid as can be, and there's plenty of pedal, tire (26 x 1.60) and chain clearance. So far so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: white rat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable. Buying another.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my 80 pound electric bike, usually with 40 pound trailer behind. Has been surprisingly reliable. Very well engineered. It does take a bit of patience to install. The 10mm bolt must be slowly tightened with little room to spare on most frames. If it does loosen, it can be very annoying as it pivots left and right into your rear spokes. However the interface with the frame has been rubberized to ensure a solid fit. I added some Locktight for extra hold. Buying an extra one for my wife's ebike. God I sound old. I am not that old.
customer_reviews.author: markalanprior

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally write reviews but this product is awesome. I have a Topeka child seat and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this product is awesome. I have a Topeka child seat and a two year old, everytime we rode together was stressful. Now I can put her in and be fully stable!
customer_reviews.author: CookingNerd

customer_reviews.title: Superior Built Kickstand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Shimano Mountain Bike (which I added Motor to) and it fit Perfectly without any modifications! I had problems with my other stand always wanting to tilt and fall over! This stand lifts the bike and centers it perfectly with very stable (strong) legs and the bike no longer wants to tilt from side to side or fall over! In fact I am able to turn and make adjustments while stand is down. I am very pleased and this rugged stand should do the job for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Super stable, even with child seat
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy kickstand for my bike since I installed a rear child seat. I tried some other ones and felt not very reassured because the bike was not very stable. However with this one, the bike is very stable and I'm able to load/unload my child with confidence. It was very easy to install too. Fair warning: it's on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed kickstand while trying to install
customer_reviews.text: Came with no instructions and tightening the bolt firmly against the center kickstand mount broke through the bottom of the kickstand and unseated the nut the bolt was threading through inside. Couldn't get anything to grip on to the nut while trying to unloosen the bolt, so I ended up having to delicately cut the top of the bolt off. In my honest opinion, this is an overpriced piece of underengineered crap. Don't buy it. I'll be trying to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Olin

customer_reviews.title: Not Entirely Universal
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on a cruiser after doing an electric conversion to help with the additional weight. Had to scrounge up some alternate bolts and washers to fit the height, and there's a bit of a gap between the lip of the plate and the mounting surface, so it's prone to rotate. Also had to chop some of the plastic feet off to keep them from rubbing the ground on hard turns. They eventually fell off when I rode over a curb. All in all, not great, but the best option I've found so far for stabilizing an overweight bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Great for people using a child bike seat!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to add to my hybrid bike because I have a child seat on my bike and I pull a double trailer so I needed a lot more stability. It's fantastic. It's very hard to pull the bike over with this stand on and my bike feels extremely secure. Very pleased with bike stand. I did have to have my local bike shop help me put it on as they had to unthread some parts to get the screw on but not a big deal really. Just something to be aware of when you start trying to do it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: ebp913

customer_reviews.title: This is my 4th kickstand in about 1 month.  The other 3 broke.  This IS the kickstand to get for sure.
customer_reviews.text: The the new URSUS Wheels Jumbo Double Leg Kickstand came in and got it mounted. Now this is what I been talking about! Massive is the word and if this one breaks, I'll eat it! I stood on a bike pedal and tried to tip the bike over, not a chance. Feet are so well laid out and so massive it will not tip. I bet it would stand up in fine on beach sand. I AM a happy camper again. Thanks URSUS!
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Marjama

customer_reviews.title: Works on a Fat tire bike with slight modification
customer_reviews.text: I recently converted my fat tire mountain bike to an Ebike and wanted a stable kickstand for what is now a very heavy bike. I had to add a couple of small spacers to keep the stand from hitting the back tire. Once this was figured out this is by far the most stable heavy duty stand I was able to find. I can recommend this for use while loading and unloading heavy items including children on your bike.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Cisluycis

customer_reviews.title: The kickstand your bike would ask for if it could talk
customer_reviews.text: If you have an electric bike, this is the kickstand you need. My ebike would fall over from the slightest bump because it is too heavy. This kickstand is awesome. It’s extremely beefy and sturdy and makes it nearly impossible for the bike to fall over. It’s not cheap, but it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, high quality stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high-quality stand, and provides just about double the side-to-side footprint of anything else I tried. I need this because my recumbent bike is a little awkward and front-heavy, and didn't come with a kickstand. My guess is that this stand will outlast the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the kickstand. I put it on my E bike, and all was good. A half month later, it started to shake on my E Bike, when it was on the floor. I was thinking it was a mechanical issue. I returned, and going to reorder it again soon. Edit: Kickstand #2: Defective. I sent it back. Time for Ursus kickstand #3. I hope 3 is a charm.
customer_reviews.author: King Dimitrios

customer_reviews.title: Kick stand
customer_reviews.text: I have a motorized mountain bike that a regular kick stand just couldn't deal with. I looked at several replacements and this is the one I choose. I does everything they say it does. It is easy to put on the bike and it works as listed and makes the bike really stable as I have a large basket on the rear that I carry a lot of heavy stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty expensive, but worth the money if you have child sit
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. But please remember, you still cant leave the child seated in your child seat without holding the bike even on this sturdy kickstand, it's not safe. But still, it is aa great help for parents.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Rvachev

customer_reviews.title: It was worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good support from company on my concerns. It just is too costly! However, I would like to believe it was needed to support the design and development of the product
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Conditional 4-5 review, leaning towards 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Conditional 4-5 review. Well made, but the bolt was about 1/2 inch too long, so I had to use 3 washers to make up for it. Now for the Sherlock Holmes part...the "parts bag" had a hole, so did a proper bolt fall out, or was it swapped by some pilfering bad guy?? I don't have access to another kickstand to check and find out if I've been bamboozled. Minus points for no real instructions (it might have clarified the "included parts list"), though it's obviously simple..
customer_reviews.author: Airboss

customer_reviews.title: E-Tandem stand
customer_reviews.text: The best stand to use on an tandem with an added mid-drive motor. Very steady and has enough drop so that the drive chain does not interfere with the stand in the up position.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great even in the sand
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my electric cruiser bike and even if I have my surfboard on one side, on the sand, it still doesn't tip over. Amazing! (pictured not on sand) Great for all kinds of heavy loads and uneven kickstand situations.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H

customer_reviews.title: works great omg our tandem.
customer_reviews.text: it works on out 700c tandem with 2" tires. but its a close thing. it does take some effort to deploy it but our tandem is 65 pounds plus stuff so that may be part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love it. The only kickstand that will prevent bikes with heavy baskets from tipping over.
customer_reviews.text: Top notch. I have a huge basket on the front of my bike, and it tipped over with every other kick stand I've tried, including some others that had 4.5-5 stars and have this double stand style. This thing is a beast. Love it. Super solid. Extremely well made. Pricey, but worth every penny if you don't want your bike and precious cargo to tip over. If you're in the market for a double kickstand, don't even waste your time with the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sprouts

customer_reviews.title: Necessary upgrade after adding bike basket and kid seats.
customer_reviews.text: Put a Thule kid seat on the back of my Dutch style step-through bike, and a large basket in the front. Original kickstand was not holding up to the new additions. Friend recommended this "ultimate" kickstand and it was perfect. Easy to install and holds the bike up no matter how the weight of the kid seat or basket wants to swing the bike around.
customer_reviews.author: lkh

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice for big eBike,  but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Not adjustable, but doesn't matter it seems. Very heavy, but on a eBike, who cares. Makes doing free wheel testing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Leatham

customer_reviews.title: Very cool purchase. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kickstand to replace the original on my bicycle. I wanted a safe center stand because I added a pet carrier to the back and feared the original would tip over Witt my dog in it. Very cool purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey but high quality
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on an early 2000s Specialized Rockhopper that does NOT have a kickstand plate welded in between the chainstays. Thankfully this kickstand came with a mounting plate. Works perfectly. For those wondering if it comes with a mounting plate, I suspect it might vary by seller. I bought mine in May 2020 and the seller was Amazon. I will come back and edit my review if I experience any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Colin C

customer_reviews.title: Solid, dependable, but feet wear out
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my heavy cargo bike. Plastic feet are wearing through after 6 months though. Will need to research how to replace them soon as the stand will become useless if the feet break - as they seem close to doing.
customer_reviews.author: LA Paul

customer_reviews.title: There is no Substitute
customer_reviews.text: I have had this on my e-bike for one year now and marvel at it every time I park my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus Carlson

customer_reviews.title: The king of kickstands.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beefy. I use it on my kid hauler (cargo bike) and I find it to be a necessary upgrade. It's pricey, but once you install it you won't regret having spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: Davide-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Kona ute oem stand a joke. Fits bicycle mount ...
customer_reviews.text: Kona ute oem stand a joke. Fits bicycle mount perfectly. Wide stance holds one side pannur loaded not a problem....
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for a baby seat very stable and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my wife’s Schwin. We have a baby seat on the back of the bike and she no longer struggles with the awkwardness of the weight. Really stable. In fact we have had it installed on two other bikes. Very simple to install and adaptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: This was a big improvement for our cargo bike. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W Baskin

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Sturdy. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kick stand. My bike weighs about 70 lbs and ive had two hebi kick stands that have failed. I feel like this will stand the test. It just feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Sheetrock

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but ‘heavy dude’
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I like something this heavy so much, but even with an 8mm hex wrench, you would still need to pry these from my dead cold hands.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chaudoir

customer_reviews.title: Works great with child bike seat
customer_reviews.text: Works stunning if you have a child bike seat on your bike.
customer_reviews.author: luminairefoto

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit all bikes...
customer_reviews.text: The legs aren't adjustable. If you measure the from the ground to the bottom of your kickstand, and your 11" or less, your good to go. My Prodeco Phantom X E-Bike is 13"... I was able to add a 1 1/2" block of wood underneath to just get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Clean

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but well worth it! Heavy but very stable!...even on non-level or non-paved surfaces. Got it for my tandem and I'm keeping it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I needed a kickstand for my Ebike and this seems to be perfect for my bike. So far, so good...
customer_reviews.author: J. WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed for most bikes. I tried this on three different bikes that I own and it didn't fit. Extremely heavy and the movement of the legs is difficult to operate. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for my electric fat tire 26" bike after super ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my electric fat tire 26" bike after super gluing 1/8 plastic shims to top of legs where they meet the body to increase spread slightly for 4 inch wide tire. Also remove feet and cut off about 2" from top of feet to help clearance and reinstall. Works great now. Price is worth the protection if you have $$$$ in your bike. Sometimes you gotta make adjustments, it's not a perfect world.....ride on....ride on.....
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth G.

customer_reviews.title: Finally aproduct thats works for my need.
customer_reviews.text: Im impressed this thing can hold up my bike while others have failed. I say this because i put heavy loads on my bike and even the pelscher kickstand wouldn't hold up although a good product for normal use i do recommend this jumbo kickstand for heavier loads.
customer_reviews.author: lizet dominguez

customer_reviews.title: this is the best kickstand you will ever get
customer_reviews.text: Wow! this is the best kickstand you will ever get. I use this on an engine powered bicycle and it does the job great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Braggjr

customer_reviews.title: Super stable
customer_reviews.text: My bike is now super stable. I really like this kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Failed early.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great then one side stopped extending fully after about 8 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

customer_reviews.title: Works with even a heavy bike
customer_reviews.text: Finally I am able to keep my heavy motorized bike upright, even in a heavy wind.
customer_reviews.author: MeanBrew

customer_reviews.title: Premium build quality (but over-engineered and HEAVY)
customer_reviews.text: Quality product but mounting options are very limited. I don't doubt how sturdy it is...but understand that this is VERY heavy for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy kickstand, and it actually makes my bike feel more balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't regret buying this kick stand
customer_reviews.text: Cost a bit more then I would like, but well worth it, My electric bike with heavy lithium battery on the back rack is very stable now.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super wide stance kickstand
customer_reviews.text: Super wide stance kickstand. Downsides are tight tire clearance, and it's heavy. If you have 28's and smaller, and dont care about weight, then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ursus Jumbo Double Leg Kickstand
product_meta.description: Ursus Jumbo kickstand combines strength and mechanical innovation to prevent your bicycle for tilting over when parked. Ursus Jumbo features a double legged center-mount design that's strong enough to stabilize your bike up to 176 lbs (80 kg). Ursus Jumbo kickstand is ideal for electric bikes as well as overloaded touring or commuter bikes. If you ride with a children's seat on your bicycle, Ursus Jumbo kickstand is a must-have item to keep your bicycle from tipping over when you stop at the park or the ice cream parlor with your child. Adaptable also for heavy duty bikes. Recommended use: - electric bicycle - heavy-duty bicycle - commuter bike with panniers - bicycle with child seat - bicycle with rear trailer. Compatible with 24" t0 28" wheelbase.
feature_bullets: Compatible with 24" - 28" wheelbase. Not compatible with 20" wheel
7" outer width when legs are folded. 18" outer width when legs are expanded
100% in aluminum with steel components - 100% made in Italy
RECOMMEND USE:Electric Bicycle,Heavy-Duty Bicycle,Commuter Bike with panniers,Bicycle with child seat,Bicycle with rear trailer

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
